movie.title: Miracle on 34th Street
movie.description_intro: Six-year-old Susan Walker discovers dreams do come true if you really believe. She has doubts about childhood's most enduring miracle, Santa Claus. Her mother, Dorey, told her the "secret" about him a long time ago, so she doesn't expect to receive the most important gifts on her Christmas list. But after meeting a special department store Santa who's convinced he's the real thing, she is given the most precious gift of all, something to believe in.
movie.description_full: Six-year-old Susan Walker discovers dreams do come true if you really believe. She has doubts about childhood's most enduring miracle, Santa Claus. Her mother, Dorey, told her the "secret" about him a long time ago, so she doesn't expect to receive the most important gifts on her Christmas list. But after meeting a special department store Santa who's convinced he's the real thing, she is given the most precious gift of all, something to believe in.

movies.title: The Anthem of the Heart
movies.summary: Takumi is on his class' community outreach group. His teacher assigns more students to the group including a student who, due to a mishap, has foregone speaking. The class has to perform a musical, but volunteers brave enough to perform are hard to come by. The reluctance slowly begins to wash away when the aforementioned girl makes an effort to perform. As the day of the performance approaches will the students be able to overcome their reluctance and go for it?
movies.description_full: Takumi is on his class' community outreach group. His teacher assigns more students to the group including a student who, due to a mishap, has foregone speaking. The class has to perform a musical, but volunteers brave enough to perform are hard to come by. The reluctance slowly begins to wash away when the aforementioned girl makes an effort to perform. As the day of the performance approaches will the students be able to overcome their reluctance and go for it?

movies.title: Space Warriors
movies.summary: A group of kid space cadets must help in the rescue of three astronauts whose ship got stranded in space.
movies.description_full: A group of kid space cadets must help in the rescue of three astronauts whose ship got stranded in space.
movies.synopsis: A group of kid space cadets must help in the rescue of three astronauts whose ship got stranded in space.

movies.title: Lady and the Tramp
movies.summary: The romantic tale of a sheltered uptown Cocker Spaniel dog and a streetwise downtown Mutt.
movies.description_full: The romantic tale of a sheltered uptown Cocker Spaniel dog and a streetwise downtown Mutt.
movies.synopsis: The romantic tale of a sheltered uptown Cocker Spaniel dog and a streetwise downtown Mutt.

movies.title: Full Out 2: You Got This!
movies.summary: When the University of Oklahoma Sooners lose their star gymnast, Brenna Dowell, the rest of the team have to find a way to believe in themselves in order to win their second National Gymnastics Championship. With the help of Riley, a local breakdancing phenomenon, Chayse and her OU teammates learn to incorporate intricate breakdance techniques into their gymnastics routines in order to find a competitive edge. At the end of it all, they realize what matters most is finding the confidence to believe in yourself.
